message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for a special introductory price of $200.  It's a fantastic deal!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $180. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $180 is a bit low for me, I could meet you halfway at $190. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $175. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but I can't go any lower than $185. This product is worth every penny, and I'm confident you'll agree once you have it.
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $185. I'm willing to meet you at $180, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you consider that?
